combinedRecognizedPhrases.display: Good afternoon. This is Sam. Thank you for calling. Contessa. How may I help? Hi there, my name is Mary. I'm currently living in Los Angeles, but I'm planning to move to Las Vegas and I would like to apply for a loan. OK, I see you're currently living in California. Let me make sure I understand you correctly. You'd like to apply for a loan even though you'll be moving soon. Is that right? Yes, exactly. So I'm planning to relocate soon, but I would like to apply for the loan 1st that I can purchase a new home once I move there. And are you planning to sell your current home? Yes, I will be listing it on the market soon and hopefully it'll sell quickly. That's why I'm applying for a loan now, so that I can purchase a new house in Nevada and close on it quickly as well once my current home sells. I see. Would you mind holding for a moment while I take your information down? Yeah, no problem. Thank you for your help. One moment. All right. Thank you for your patience, ma'am. May I have your first and last name please? Yes, my name is Mary Smith all. Right. Thank you, Miss Smith. May I have your current address please? Yes. So my address is 123 Main St. in Los Angeles, CA and the zip code is 90923. Sorry, that was a nine Zero what? 90923. 90923 on Main Street. Got it. Thank you. May I have your phone number as well please? Yes, my phone number is 504-529-2351 and then? 2351 got it. And do you have an e-mail address we I can associate with this application? Yes. So my e-mail address is mary.a.sm78@gmail.com. Mary dot a Was that ASN as in November or M as in Mike? M as in Mike. M78 Got it. Thank you, Miss Smith, Do you currently have any other loans? Yes. So I currently have two other loans through Contoso. So my first one is my car loan and then my other is my student loan. They total about 1400 per month combined and my interest rate is 8%. I see. And you're currently paying those loans off monthly, is that right? Yes, of course I do. OK, thank you. Here's what I suggest we do. Let me place you on a brief hold again so that I can talk with one of our loan loan officers and get this started for you immediately. And in the meantime, would be great if you could take a few minutes and complete the remainder of the secure application online at the www.contosoloans.com. Yeah, that sounds good. I can go ahead and get started. Thank you for your help. Thank you.

summaries.text: The customer wants to apply for a loan to purchase a new home in Las Vegas before moving from Los Angeles.

The agent collected the customer's information and suggested that the customer complete the remainder of the secure application online at www.contosoloans.com. The agent then placed the customer on hold to talk with a loan officer to get the process started.

combinedRedactedContent.display: Good afternoon. This is ***. Thank you for calling. ********. How may I help? OK, I see you're currently living in California. Let me make sure I understand you correctly. You'd like to apply for a loan even though you'll be moving soon. Is that right? And are you planning to sell your current home? I see. Would you mind holding for a moment while I take your information down? One moment. All right. Thank you for your patience, ma'am. May I have your first and last name please? Right. Thank you, Miss *****. May I have your current address please? *****, that was ****************? ********************. Got it. Thank you. May I have your phone number as well please? **** got it. And do you have an e-mail address we I can associate with this application? ******************************************************* *** Got it. Thank you, Miss *****, Do you currently have any other loans? I see. And you're currently paying those loans off monthly, is that right? OK, thank you. Here's what I suggest we do. Let me place you on a brief hold again so that I can talk with one of our loan loan officers and get this started for you immediately. And in the meantime, would be great if you could take a few minutes and complete the remainder of the secure application online at the www.*************com. Thank you.

combinedRedactedContent.display: Hi there, my name is ****. I'm currently living in Los Angeles, but I'm planning to move to Las Vegas and I would like to apply for a loan. Yes, exactly. So I'm planning to relocate soon, but I would like to apply for the loan 1st that I can purchase a new home once I move there. Yes, I will be listing it on the market soon and hopefully it'll sell quickly. That's why I'm applying for a loan now, so that I can purchase a new house in Nevada and close on it quickly as well once my current home sells. Yeah, no problem. Thank you for your help. Yes, my name is ********** all. Yes. So my address is ************ ********************************************. *****. Yes, my phone number is *********************? Yes. So my e-mail address is *********************. ************. Yes. So I currently have two other loans through Contoso. So my first one is my car loan and then my other is my student loan.
